Summary: Right beside 22 freeway, but no traffic noise at night. Surprisingly  quiet neighborhood.  Pleasant  young man at reception.  Room was clean, average size. I would have given it another star, but the bed was uncomfortable  and undersize. They called it a queen bed, but our guest bedroom queen size at home is not that small.

Betty gave me 20 more min and gave me a lot of help when I was leaving the motel in general was really great no bad experience rooms where clean and beds where don‚Äôt with new sheets thank you a lot for this

Carolina the General Manager did not warn anyone about the pool or shut it down for over a week ever thought it looked like blue milk! She said ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs safe swim in!‚Äù So we asked the maintenance man and he said that it was too dangerous and she was ‚Äúcrazy.‚Äù  She also won‚Äôt refund us for checking out early due to cockroaches all over our headboard! They hide behind it and crawl in and out as they please. She claims she ‚Äúpaid terminix‚Äù to come out but we watched HER go into the room, turn the sheets over and then leave the room and told the maid to clean it up for the next guest. When we showed her pictures and videos from an Apple phone with time stamps and location she called us liars.   As we were leaving we heard her screaming at another couple for ‚Äúcalling the health department

Summary Heading: Diana the assistant manager is unprofessional
Summary: My brother had paid a week in advance but he had an issue and had to leave the room before his week was over. I went in the office to see if they could refund him 2 days he had left or to see what could be done. I'm visiting from Arizona for a month and I was considering switching to this hotel. I went in today and spoke with Diana (the assistant manager) and was so surprised with her unprofessional and disrespectful attitude and tone she spoke to me with. Her unprofessionalism is not acceptable. Thanks to that I'm taking my business elsewhere. Beware of her if you decide to stay here.

Really friendly and accommodating stuff will be returning . I appreciate it the last minute check-in and the staff being so kind I also got supplies when the housekeepers were very busy thank you so much will be coming back soon
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your review with us.  We're happy to hear the stay was great and appreciate you recognizing the great service provided by our staff.  We hope to see you soon, Safe Travels!  Nancy Y.	 #Team6

Summary Heading: Horrible, noisy, dirty.... Not appropriate for families!!!
Summary: We needed a 1night stay between Disney and universal, so we wasn't after anything amazing or special. Just a bed, roof and shower, for myself, my wife and 3 yound children. So found this place on booking.com. I didn't go through the reviews as I was in a rush and with it having a decent overall rating I booked it. when we arrived we where located in a room around the back of the motel. We walked down the path where our room was located and had to walk through an intimidating group of people that looked like they lived there. The smell was horrendous, the room was horrible with cigarette burns in the sheets, bits of rubbish on the floor. We could hear the other people outside, so my wife requested that we got moved as our children where worried..... So we got moved to the front
Manager Response: Hi Andy,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are committed to provide a comfortable night's rest and are disappointed to learn that we fell short of your expectations. On behalf of Motel 6, we would like to apologize that your stay was less than satisfactory.  We are committed to guest satisfaction and appreciate you taking time to review your experience.

Summary: Check-in staff were friendly, room was clean and spacious. WiFi was fine. Bed comfortable. Despite being right by the freeway, the noise intrusion was minimal thanks to good soundproofing. There is a starbucks just next-door which is open from 4.30am - handy for me as I had an early start. I would recommend this place.
Manager Response: Dear WH White, Thank you for taking time to share your review with us. We love hearing from our guests and are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you again soon. Safe Travels.

Summary: One of the cleanest non luxury motels I‚Äôve stayed at. Pet friendly and quite. I very much dislike the 200 word minimum requirement. Very discouraging and deters me from posting more. This will be my last.

We were very impressed with this property.  The hotel staff were very friendly, the room we had was #200, just above the office and it's huge, perfect for family of 4.  The pool / yard area was well kept.  We wanted something budget friendly for a trip to the beach (we visited Seal Beach, about 15 min drive from this hotel) and Universal Studios (about a 1 hour drive but all freeway).  There is a FABULOUS restaurant in the same parking lot where we grabbed a late night snack after Universal (about 10:30pm) and got it to take back to our room.  There was some noise from the freeway which is close but we had the air conditioner on all night and no one was bothered by it. We enjoy Motel 6 properties a lot and have added a new favorite to the list.
Room tip: Room #200 is very large with a table chair set for eating at, 2 double beds, mini fridge, TV and...

Summary: This hotel was everything I expected to be and some more.   I just needed a place to sleep before taking my dog to the beach. They have a good pet policy and don‚Äôt charge anything additional. They didn‚Äôt even ask for a deposit.   The room was fine, cleanish and the bed was no luxury mattress. But what do you expect in a $80 a night hotel. Staff was friendly and I felt safe (ish) here.   Guinness says thanks and he can‚Äôt wait for the beach!

It is quite noisy. Very close to the freeway and on a very busy street, so there is constant truck, motorcycle and car noise. Abuts some fast food places whose dumpsters are noisily emptied in the wee hours. Impossible for me to sleep through. You may have better luck. Office staff are cheerful and efficient.

Quick and easy check in. girls at the front desk are kind no hassles. Overall stay ok dont get room downstairs cuz people above you u can hear walking thumping sounds so it gets annoying through out the night.

After reading the reviews, I had mixed feelings. I am glad I took the plunge. This hotel is absolutely fine. Nice updated and clean room. My experience was pleasant. The front desk staff was very friendly and helpful. I had no complaints whatsoever. I would recommend this hotel with utmost confidence

The staff and manager are very friendly and polite. The rooms and outside are clean and well maintained. Your close to everything gas food and freeways. I definitely recommend staying here vs others for a quiet clean comfortable stay.

I am used to basics at Motel 6 but this 2-story gem was not only attractively laid out with courtyard pool and garden area but was very, very quiet with upgraded rooms, senior free wifi, great TV, fridge.  Right off freeway, restaurant next door, helpful staff, always great value.  Highly recommend.

Recently stayed there, at first I was a bit skeptical,  because I was alone, but it was nice and quiet very clean..no drama. Front desk was very curtious. Close to everything,  gas food, coffee . Pool area was also nice and clean.

The only reason I decided to give this Motel 6 two stars instead of one is bc of the seemingly new renovations and low price. However, I don't think I'll ever reserve a room for my fiance and myself here again! Our first stay we reserved a room for a single night and requested a late checkout and were given until 1 PM. I then reserved a room for a single night about a week later requesting a late checkout and was told 12 PM. That was a little surprising, but I assumed that the guidelines may have changed bc things like that happen. I work graveyard shifts and turned in at around 3 AM and woke up to the phone ringing at 11 AM as a reminder that checkout was 11AM! I groggily requested a late checkout once again and was told we had until 11:30! WHAT?! Once I explained that we were

I decided to try this place due to great reviews I saw . The staff was great and helped me with every question I asked . There is a subway and Starbucks next door. Also a 24 spiers. I wouldn't mind staying here again.

Excellent customer service and WiFi service. No interruptions and clean rooms. Close to freeway and wake up call accurate when needed. Front desk is friendly and always smiling. Well informed. Will stay here again.

CLEAN, WELL LOCATED, STORES,  GAS STATIONS, AND EATING.  Depending on your room location, ice machine and vending machines can be a hike. Costomer service is ok. House cleaning comes early and can be annoying in the morning, or closse to checkout time.

I survived! I can now check off on my bucket list that I have stayed at a Motel 6! You know when you are venturing out onto unchartered territory when the motel safe is exposed behind the office counter and the place has a night window. And according to the motel website, in collaboration with Google, this place has a rating of four stars out of five. I suppose, it's like winning a MTV Movie Award, but never, ever being considered for a nomination for an Academy Award. Speaking of films, this motel has to be the greatest disaster since any Adam Sandler movies that have been made and yet to be made. Let's get started with room 114 door, which greeted us with a baritone groan at the hinges. Even the Tin Man in the "Wizard of Oz" was lubricated every now and then. Hey, Motel 6! The
Manager Response: Benedict,      Thank you for taking the time to post your review. We are committed to delivering a clean, comfortable room and apologize for any failure in delivering on the commitment during your recent stay. We strive to provide a comfortable night's rest and are disappointed your stay was unsatisfactory due to the comfort issues you describe. We invite you to contact our Guest Relations department at 1-855-787-9864 to record the details of your visit to help us provide a better guest experience.

Summary: The place smelled horrible like pea everywhere outside. One of the staff members named Anna has the worst attude. One of her comments were and I quote "You are a visitor in my house, my rules." This was told to a woman who was disabled with a walker and wanted to put a microwave in her room cause it was hard for her to walk. I was in the office when she told the old woman that. On top of everything else there were fights and arguments that all hours of the night. So don't expect to sleep. I saw people selling drugs, people would walk up to me asking if I knew where to get drugs, and people in the parking lot doing drugs. I had to call the police cause some woman was using my car hood to snort lines off of. If you want a family friendly Motel6 it's not this one. But the Stanton
Manager Response: Sheena, Thank you for taking the time to post your review. We strive to deliver a great guest experience, but it sounds as though we did not perform to our usual standards in this case. Safety and security are high priorities within Motel 6 standards for quality and we regret you felt differently during your visit. Please know the issues you describe are an exception to our guest commitment and as such, we apologize. We are committed to delivering a clean, comfortable room and apologize for any failure in delivering on the commitment during your recent stay. The service concerns you describe are atypical to Motel 6 standards for quality our colleagues strive to provide, and we apologize for the inconveniences you experienced. We encourage you to contact our Guest Relations department at 1-855-787-9864 to record the details of your visit to help us provide a better guest experience in the future.

Summary: Old, well used, cheap, locals residing here, def a bit sketchy but it was quiet at night. Probably not a great place for the kids.   Stayed here Sunday to Monday. 3 restaurants and a bar and a liquor store across the street. Convenient to retail shopping within a few blocks.

I booked a room over travelocity thinking everything was okay. When I got there the clerk asked if I reserved a room, I told her yes. I checked in, went straight to my room. I then checked my account balance on my card and realized that I had more money taken out than what should've been. Come to find out the clerk charged me twice for the same reservation. After what felt like endless minutes, it took 2 hours for the company to finally give me my refund for the money they took. Which I will NOT be getting back until Tuesday or Wednesday. Not only that but if you want to sight see you have to drive 30-45 miles in evwey direction just to see what California has to offer. The location was terrible. I can defiantly say this was the most biggest pain my butt. So if you decide to

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, alright area, rooms are ran down.
Summary: I've stayed her multiple times to save money, the staff and front desk is always super nice. It's an alright deal but the rooms are ran down the carpets are clean but the beds suck there uncomfortable and I don't feel there as clean as they could be. Pillows suck as well I hope for them to upgrade this sometime soon. The tv channels are good but the tv is very outdated and old. The air also doesn't always work great and the heater stinks for the first 20 minutes. Other than outdated things the stay is overall nice.

Staff is friendly and helpful, room was clean, had no problems. My only complaint is that the internet is too slow. I prefer the rooms near the pool and office rather than the backside...that's where some of the parking is and it's more noisy.

This place is super cute on the outside. Pretty building, nice poolside courtyard. However, the rooms were lacking. The first thing I noticed was that the bedspread was riddled with holes and tears. It honestly belonged in the trash. The bathroom smelled like hot feet. Oh yeah, and there was no clock in the room. The basin in the sink was cracked and yucky. The television was about thirty years old. Eew.

My husband and I had to make a last minute trip to Orange County and so began our search for a hotel/motel for that same night. Our first choices were all booked, so we began looking for what was available...we knew we had a chance with motel 6 and so based on the current reviews for this motel, we decided to call and reserve.  We were pleasantly surprised! Althought not in the best area (but you can't really tell), the staff was very friendly, quiet for the most part (during the day you can hear kids in the pool but no big deal-defintely quiet at night and in the morning) and VERY CLEAN! Bathroom looked like it was thoroughly cleaned. The sheets on the bed were clean and neat. There were plenty of families as guests so it did not seem like a shady motel at all.  Add the value

Summary Heading: Lacks professional management skills and customer service
Summary: Clean rooms when they remember to clean them and when you being to there attention that they forgot yours that day , your a bad customer....its ok the let every drug addict and hooker that the surrrounding motels won't rent to and give them there own little area in the back to operate but when you cut your finger and ask for a bandaid they five you a card with risk managements phone number and 86 you from there property...it ok  terrible policies and many unhappy customers ....more to follow.
Tai who works the days and Fabian at night are some of the most professional and curtious employees at a motel I have ever had the opportunity to meet. Great place

I am a single grandmother raising my 2 young grandchildren.  I am homeless.  This is a very, very hard thing to say.  But here at Motel 6 13100 Goldenwest St., Westminister, CA. that is not a problem.  First of all they treat me like a princess and my girls like angeles that they are.  Erica is the manager and she is great.  All the staff are wonderful.  The cleaning staff work so hard to make sure that everything is spotless, they even take the screens out and clean them, who does that.  The maintance people are great.  My air-conditioner did not work & my shower needed fixing and it was done in less than 30 min.  Wow. My only complaint is that why aren't the other motel 6's like this one.  Please try them out.  The other thing is that we are next to the ele. school. Plus they
I dont think this was the best stay I had at a motel, but it wasn't bad for the money. Friendly service, clean pool,  good price. It was in a good location. No bugs in my room.
This place was gross there was a drity towel under my bed it smelled and on top of it was all the freeway noise . i would not stay here again the staff also didnt seem to friendly .

Staff is very helpful and friendly, easy to find, very clean rooms and realy quiet, also has free wireless internet, have been to this site multiple times and everyone makes my wife and myself feel right at home. We stop here for our weekend trips to the beach, just five min to beach, love this place.
The Motel 6 Westminster North is an excellent, cost-efficient option. The hotel is well-managed, clean, and quiet.

Summary Heading: Really made us feel at home!
Summary: Our recent stay at Motel 6 Westminster North was great! From check-in through check-out the staff was helpful and efficient. The room was clean, comfortable, and everything was in excellent working order. When we had a small problem with the drapes, maintenance took care of it the same day. Overall, the property is well maintained, well-lit, quiet, and very convenient to the 22. They have a nice pool (though it was too cold to use it -- we did sit around it and play UNO with our daughter.) We were travelling with pets and found their pet-friendly policy to be a great benefit -- pets aren't just allowed, they are welcome!

Summary Heading: this motel 6 really changed the way i look at getting a motel room as opposed to a hotel room.
Summary: I really enjoyed my stay at this motel six. the staff is very friendly and helpful. the rooms are clean and its a pleasant enviroment there. I am a bit surprised that I could get such great service at such a low price. I would recomend this motel 6 to anyone staying in the westminster area.

We picked this Motel 6 because it was the closest to Seal Beach (with the scary exception of the Long Beach Motel6).We had never stayed there before and the exterior was clean & nice.It was a good feeling because we booked 3 nights there (also saved a few $ by going online :) The check-in staff were friendly and no problems with our reservation,price,etc., and they let us check in early. We were really surprised when we entered the room,it was clean and the towels were wrapped like at a 4-5 star hotel,and the toilet paper had the "v" fold.My wife really liked that it had a bathtub for our girls and we even used it a couple times(very nice after a day at the beach).It didn't have central air conditioning,which we were grateful to have the older individual a/c as they seem to work
